Question
========

Ten lottery tickets are sold at random to ten people. The probability of winning for person A and person B is respectively

Answerlist
----------

* $\frac{1}{10},\frac{1}{10}$
* $\frac{1}{10},\frac{9}{10}$
* $\frac{1}{10},\frac{1}{2}$
* $\frac{1}{2},\frac{1}{10}$

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* $\frac{1}{10},\frac{1}{10}$: Correct
* $\frac{1}{10},\frac{9}{10}$: Incorrect
* $\frac{1}{10},\frac{1}{2}$: Incorrect
* $\frac{1}{2},\frac{1}{10}$: Incorrect
